wobani.rendering.prepare

Class ShadowRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • wobani.rendering.Renderer
      • wobani.rendering.prepare.PrepareRenderer
        • wobani.rendering.prepare.ShadowRenderer

  • public class ShadowRenderer
extends PrepareRenderer
    Performs shadow map rendering.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private float distance
      The directional light's shadow camera's distance from the user's camera's center.

      • isFrustumCulling

        public boolean isFrustumCulling()
        Determines whether frustum culling is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if frustum culling is enabled, false otherwise

      • setFrustumCulling

        public void setFrustumCulling(boolean frustumCulling)
        Sets whether or not frustum culling is enabled.
        Parameters:
        frustumCulling - true if frustum culling should be enabled, false otherwise

      • getInstance

        @NotNull
public static ShadowRenderer getInstance()
        Returns the ShadowRenderer instance.
        Returns:
        the ShadowRenderer instance

      • isInsideFrustum

        public boolean isInsideFrustum(@NotNull
                               org.joml.Vector3f position,
                               float radius)
        Returns true if the sphere (determined by the given parameters) is inside, or intersects the frustum and returns false if it is fully outside. Note that if frustum culling is disabled, or this Component isn't connected to a GameObject this method always returns true.
        Parameters:
        position - position
        radius - radius
        Returns:
        false if the sphere is fully outside the frustum, true otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - position can't be null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - radius can't be negative
        See Also:
        Settings#isFrustumCulling()

      • isInsideFrustum

        public boolean isInsideFrustum(@NotNull
                               org.joml.Vector3f aabbMin,
                               @NotNull
                               org.joml.Vector3f aabbMax)
        Returns true if the axis alligned bounding box (determined by the given parameters) is inside, or intersects the frustum and returns false if it is fully outside. Note that if frustum culling is disabled, or this Component isn't connected to a GameObject this method always returns true.
        Parameters:
        aabbMin - the axis alligned bounding box's minimum x, y and z values
        aabbMax - the axis alligned bounding box's maximum x, y and z values
        Returns:
        false if the bounding box is fully outside the frustum, true otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - the parameters can't be null
        See Also:
        Settings#isFrustumCulling()

      • setShadowCameraDistance

        public void setShadowCameraDistance(float shadowCameraDistance)
        Sets the shadow camera's distance from the user's camera's center to the given value.
        Parameters:
        shadowCameraDistance - the shadow camera's distance from the user's camera's center
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - the parameter have to be higher than zero

      • getShadowCameraNearDistance

        public float getShadowCameraNearDistance()
        Returns the shadow camera's near plane's distance.
        Returns:
        the shadow camera's near plane's distance

      • setShadowCameraNearDistance

        public void setShadowCameraNearDistance(float shadowCameraNearDistance)
        Sets the shadow camera's near plane's distance to the given value.
        Parameters:
        shadowCameraNearDistance - the shadow camera's near plane's distance
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - near plane's distance must be higher than 0 and it can't be higher than the far plane's distance

      • getShadowCameraFarDistance

        public float getShadowCameraFarDistance()
        Returns the shadow camera's far plane's distance.
        Returns:
        the shadow camera's far plane's distance

      • setShadowCameraFarDistance

        public void setShadowCameraFarDistance(float shadowCameraFarDistance)
        Sets the shadow camera's far plane's distance to the given value.
        Parameters:
        shadowCameraFarDistance - the shadow camera's far plane's distance
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - far plane's distance must be higher than the near plane's distance

                                RenderableComponent renderableComponent)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • release

        public void release()
        Removes the shader program and the FBO from the GPU's memory. After this method call you can't use this GeometryRenderer.
        Specified by:
        release in class Renderer

      • isUsable

        public boolean isUsable()
        Description copied from class: Renderer
        Determines wheter this GeometryRenderer is usable. If it returns false, you can't use if for anything.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        true if usable, false otherwise
